title: STUCK ON AUTHENICATING
body: Me and my friend have been stuck on the authenticating screen so far we haven't found a solution and we really need help{{champion:103}}

replies.body: Me and my friend are with spark as well i guess were gonna pin this one on spark. I guess we just have to wait for them to sort it out. I read a post not too long ago saying that spark users will occasionally have problems.{{champion:32}}
Lame. Ok let us know when you can get online : ^)
its up fam have a good night and good luck with the grind
spark user as well, maybe its the provider?
Same lad, I am using Spark as well
Let's watch some Kpop to relieve our soul so weary
Mine seems to be working fine now :)
Anybody know why this is happening?
I am stuck on Authenticating too i finished a ranked game and i got error message {exit instead} tried to relog in and bam! happened in a {{summoner:4}}
Me too, I am also with spark {{sticker:sg-janna}}

My friend and I have the same issue. 

If we close league after waiting for 10 minutes of "authenticating" it doesn't want to reopen for a while or until the processes are ended via Task Manager.

Spark is my ISP
Same here, I am on spark just for reference
